properties.description: Description Custom Manual - MCSB Baseline item PA-7 for API Management
properties.displayName: MCSB Baseline item PA-7 for API Management

features.featureDescription: Azure Role-Based Access Control (Azure RBAC) can be used to managed access to service's data plane actions.
features.featureGuidance: Use Azure role-based access control (Azure RBAC) for controlling access to Azure API Management. Azure API Management relies on Azure role-based access control to enable fine-grained access management for API Management services and entities (for example, APIs and policies).
features.customerActionsDescription: Follow just enough administration (least privilege) principle

automatedPolicyAvailability.policyName: API Management subscriptions should not be scoped to all APIs
automatedPolicyAvailability.policyDescription: API Management subscriptions should be scoped to a product or an individual API instead of all APIs, which could result in an excessive data exposure.
